name: Roy Estrada
description:
'''Roy Estrada''' (also known as "'''Roy Ralph Moleman Guacamole Guadalupe Hidalgo Estrada'''" and "'''Orej√≥n'''"; born April 17, 1943) is an American former musician. He is best known for being the original bassist of both [[the Mothers of Invention]] and [[Little Feat]]. He was also later a member of [[Captain Beefheart]]'s [[the Magic Band]] and occasionally still worked with [[Frank Zappa]] in Zappa's solo career following the Mothers' split.

Estrada is currently incarcerated in the [[Texas Department of Criminal Justice|Texas State Prison System]]. He was convicted for sex offenses on at least three occasions between 1977 and 2012. He will not be eligible for release until 2037, at which time he will potentially be between 93 and 94 years old.
